data.name: Obscurite Magie: The City of Sin
data.detailed_description:
Latest Release

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1342120/Castaway_of_the_Ardusta_Sea/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1989450/Public_Defense_Corp_The_Ambassador_of_Peace/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1410980/Serafina_and_the_Key_to_the_Egg/


Upcoming Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1419750/Apostle_Rebellion/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724320/Noelle_Does_Her_Best/


About the Game





Louise Farren is a dagger-wielding bounty hunter. But when her precious family dagger is stolen, she goes on a mission to track the thieves down.

Her search, however, takes her to an infamous town called Ruedidalia, a hive of some of the most dangerous criminals.

And to make things even more complicated, she's asked to deal with some tough bounties while in town.

Will she be able to deal with these difficult bounties and get her family's dagger back?

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Turn-based Combat
  • Leveling System
  • Multiple Difficulties
  • Fully Original Soundtrack
data.about_the_game:
Louise Farren is a dagger-wielding bounty hunter. But when her precious family dagger is stolen, she goes on a mission to track the thieves down.

Her search, however, takes her to an infamous town called Ruedidalia, a hive of some of the most dangerous criminals.

And to make things even more complicated, she's asked to deal with some tough bounties while in town.

Will she be able to deal with these difficult bounties and get her family's dagger back?

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Turn-based Combat
  • Leveling System
  • Multiple Difficulties
  • Fully Original Soundtrack
data.short_description: A classic-style, turn-based RPG. After her precious family dagger is stolen, Louise tracks the thieves to the infamous town of Ruedidalia. But her situation becomes even more difficult when she is tasked with incredibly tough bounties.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
